name: HECC
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 Submission GGJ Link

Hazardous & Emergency Construction Company is hired to fix the buildings as quakes occur.
Drag and drop the respective materials to the damages on buildings to fix them, and refill at the warehouse.
Should a building not receive fixes, and their integrity runs out, they can collapse, and go on your record.

Credits

  • Christian Encarnacion - Programmer
  • Carlos Orama - Programmer
  • Carlos Encarnacion - Artist
  • Anediel Garcia - Artist

Current Version: 0.2 - PostJam01 - Added Timed Sessions (2, 5 and 10 minutes)
